product_name: Arc'teryx Covert Hoodie Fleece Jacket - Men's
long_description: The Arc'teryx Covert Hoodie men's fleece jacket provides everyday styling with the comfort of plush, breathable, quick-drying fleece. Wear it around town, camping and hiking. Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) sweater-knit polyester fleece boosts thermal performance. Durable, color-contrasted binding on hem, cuffs and hood. Two laminated hand pockets and 1 sleeve pocket with glued-in zippers.
short_description: The Arc'teryx Covert Hoodie men's fleece jacket provides everyday styling with the comfort of plush, breathable, quick-drying fleece. Wear it around town, camping and hiking.
